# NgxGen, version 1.0.0

Generate Nginx configuration from YAML files

## Repository

Upstream repository is <https://gitlab.com/xgqt/xgqt-python-app-ngxgen/>.

## Package

Download from PYPI: <https://pypi.org/project/ngxgen-app/>.
